thoughts.text: Now that I have some search results, I can use the get_hyperlinks command to find related websites and narrow down my search.
thoughts.reasoning: Using the get_hyperlinks command allows me to find more specific websites related to my search.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the get_hyperlinks command to find related websites to the search results.
- Use the browse_website command to explore the related websites and find fun activities to do in NYC.
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to only visit reputable websites and not click on any suspicious links.
thoughts.speak: Now that I have some search results, I can use the get_hyperlinks command to find related websites and narrow down my search.
